instructions.en: Wash broccoli and peel away the tough outer layer of the stems
instructions.sk: Umyte brokolicu a olúpte tvrdú vonkajšiu vrstvu stoniek
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーを洗い、茎の固い外皮を剥く

instructions.en: Cut each broccoli stalk into 2-3 spears
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte každú stonku brokolice na 2-3 ružice
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーの茎を2〜3本の小房に切り分ける

instructions.en: Arrange broccoli in a large skillet and add water to 1 inch depth. Sprinkle with salt
instructions.sk: Uložte brokolicu do veľkej panvice a pridajte vodu do výšky 2,5 cm. Posoľte
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンにブロッコリーを並べ、2.5cmの深さまで水を入れる。塩をふる

instructions.en: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer. Cover and cook for 3 minutes
instructions.sk: Priveďte do varu, potom znížte teplotu na mierny var. Prikryte a varte 3 minúty
instructions.ja: 沸騰させてから弱火にし、蓋をして3分間煮る
火を止めて水気を切る

instructions.en: Cover the pan and let stand off the heat for 5 minutes
instructions.sk: Prikryte panvicu a nechajte odstáť mimo tepla 5 minút
instructions.ja: フライパンに蓋をして火を止めたまま5分間蒸らす

instructions.en: Season to taste and add butter before serving
instructions.sk: Pred podávaním ochuťte podľa chuti a pridajte maslo
instructions.ja: 味を調え、バターを加えて供する
